lead_paragraph: U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee Chairman Charles Grassley said on Tuesday that amendments to a bill to lower sentences for certain non-violent drug offenders are close to being finished.

headline.main: Final Sentencing Reform Bill Near, Says Senate's Grassley
headline.print_headline: Final Sentencing Reform Bill Near, Says Senate's Grassley

snippet: U.S. Senate Judiciary Committee Chairman Charles Grassley said on Tuesday that amendments to a bill to lower sentences for certain non-violent drug offenders are close to being finished.
